extracted_playbook.title: Identify Affected System and Version
extracted_playbook.description: Check if the system is affected by CVE-2022-22005 or CVE-2022-21984 by retrieving the installed software version and configurations.

extracted_playbook.condition: Is the system affected by CVE-2022-22005 or CVE-2022-21984?

extracted_playbook.title: Apply Microsoft Security Updates
extracted_playbook.description: Apply the Security Updates recommended by Microsoft to mitigate the vulnerabilities CVE-2022-22005 and CVE-2022-21984.

affected_products: Microsoft SharePoint Enterprise Server 2013 Service Pack 1
Windows 10 Version 21H2 for 32-bit, x64 and AMR64-based Systems
Windows 11 for x64 and ARM64-based Systems
Windows 10 Version 32-bit, x64 and AMR64-based Systems
